In the Spirit of Christ.--We cannot help the Christless by finding fault with them. We have not been given the work of reproving or giving personal 
                                                                           67
thrusts in our periodicals. This attitude is misleading, We are to be "not easily provoked." We are to remember that by our spiritual attitude we are to show that we are feeding on Christ, the bread of life. By our words, our tempers, and our works, we may testify to those with whom we come in contact, that the Spirit of Christ dwells in us.--Manuscript 46, 1898.
